game_description: You are the first human to travel to the edge of a black hole without a return ticket, in this small space adventure you will face situations and dangers that no one has ever seen before. Small space adventure where you will have to use your logic, skill with weapons and patience. Your mission is to survive, an adventure not for those who look for easy things, you will find yourself in situations where your only weapon will be patience and attention to what happens in order to escape from certain death.
review_1: Mind blowing experience and good graphics for this price..
review_2: I really have enjoyed the game so far. Super cool concept. Only issue is I haven’t really been able to play the game yet because I can’t get past the training. Most of the training exercises seem impossible to pass and it gets frustrating because I just want to get to the actual game. Otherwise, the game itself looks really cool. I can’t wait to pass the training exercises and see more!
